dt: {bc}a mustering of scattered forces to renew an effort
{bc}a summoning up of strength or courage after weakness or dejection
{bc}a recovery of price after a decline
{bc}a mass meeting intended to arouse group enthusiasm
{bc}a series of shots interchanged between players (as in tennis) before a point is won

{bc}an automobile competition using public roads and ordinary traffic rules with the object of maintaining a specified average speed between checkpoints over a route unknown to the participants until the start of the event

shortdef: a mustering of scattered forces to renew an effort
a summoning up of strength or courage after weakness or dejection
a recovery of price after a decline
